products.name: Codebook
products.long_description: E-Commerce with React, Tailwind CSS, JSON Server, JWTAuth, Context API. Hosted on Netlify/Render

products.name: Filmomat
products.overview: Explore movies effortlessly with our React-based web app.
products.long_description: Movie information web-application built with React, Tailwind CSS, TMDB API and deployed on Netlify

products.name: Little Lemon Capstone Project
products.overview: The Little Lemon Capstone Project is a front-end web application developed as part of the Meta Front-End Developer Certificate program on Coursera. This project showcases the creation of a responsive and interactive restaurant website for Little Lemon, featuring a table reservation system built with React.
products.long_description: The Little Lemon Capstone Project is a responsive restaurant website built with React and Tailwind CSS as part of the Meta Front-End Developer Certificate. Users can explore the menu, view restaurant details, and make table reservations by selecting date, time, and party size.The project showcases modern front-end skills including component-based architecture, responsive design, and interactive UI elements, providing a clean, user-friendly experience across devices.

products.name: Weather-app
products.overview: Weather-app using openweathermap api, React and tailwindcss
products.long_description: Weather-app is a sleek and intuitive weather application built using React.js and styled with Tailwind CSS. It provides users with up-to-date weather information for any location around the globe, empowering them to plan their day accordingly.

products.name: Word Counter
products.overview: The Word Counter app is a handy tool for counting characters and words in any text.
products.long_description: The Word Counter app is a simple yet powerful tool designed to help users count the number of characters and words in any text input. Whether you're a writer, student, or professional, this app provides an efficient way to track the length of your text in real-time.

products.name: Shopmate-v2
products.overview: Shopmate is a user-friendly e-commerce platform offering a diverse range of producs version 2
products.long_description: Shopmate is an innovative e-commerce platform that offers a seamless shopping experience to users. With a user-friendly interface and robust features, Shopmate simplifies the process of online shopping, making it convenient and enjoyable for customers.

products.name: Shopmate
products.overview: Shopmate is a user-friendly e-commerce platform offering a diverse range of producs
products.long_description: Shopmate is an innovative e-commerce platform that offers a seamless shopping experience to users. With a user-friendly interface and robust features, Shopmate simplifies the process of online shopping, making it convenient and enjoyable for customers.

products.name: Terminal digital menu
products.overview: A digital menu for local cafe and restaurant in Kragujevac
products.long_description: A digital menu replaces traditional paper menus with electronic displays on devices like tablets or screens. They offer dynamic updates, interactive features, and detailed item descriptions, enhancing the dining experience for customers while reducing costs and improving efficiency for businesses.

products.name: Internet Cafe
products.overview: Modern coffee shop website using react and tailwind.css
products.long_description: Internet Cafe is a cozy and modern coffee shop that blends the charm of a traditional cafe with the convenience of high-speed internet. Enjoy our selection of gourmet coffees, teas, and fresh pastries while you surf the web, catch up on work, or connect with friends in a relaxed and inviting atmosphere.

products.name: Birthday Reminder
products.overview: Birthday Reminder is an app to track birthdays and see which ones are today. Users can add new birthdays, view todayâ€™s birthdays, and clear the list. Data is saved in local storage.
products.long_description: Birthday Reminder helps you manage and celebrate birthdays. Add new birthdays by entering a name, birthday, and optional image. The app shows a list of people with birthdays on the current day and calculates their age automatically. You can also clear the entire list when needed. All data is stored in local storage for easy access across sessions.
